 TestCase_BC025_Identity_bufferPartiallyUnwritable ()
 
 TestCase_BC025_Identity_bufferCompletelyUnwritable ()
 

Detailed Description

Description:
: This test intends to verify the behavior of TA properties APIs in getting a property as a string. 
           TEE_Result TEE_GetPropertyAsString(
                               TEE_PropSetHandle propsetOrEnumerator,
               [instringopt]   char* name,
               [outstring]     char* valueBuffer, size_t* valueBufferLen );

           For this test, we will need at least one TA.

           Enumeration is not performed in this test.

           Pre:
           Open a session to a GPTA.

           Post:
           Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC001_UUID_gpd_ta_appID ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that the UUID gpd_ta_appID property can be correctly retrieved as a string.
Test Steps:
Allocate a buffer of the length required for a UUID 
             Call the API
             * for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA,
             * with name gpd_ta_appID,
             * with the new buffer.

             Then verify that the syntax matches RFC 4122, i.e.
             * format similar to 6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8 and
             * allow upper and lower cases and
             * TEE_SUCCESS,
             * verify the length field
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.GC001_UUID_gpd_ta_appID
TestCase_GC002_UUID_gpd_tee_deviceID ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that the UUID gpd_tee_deviceID property can be correctly retrieved as a string.
Test Steps:
Allocate a buffer of the length required for a UUID 
             Call the API
             * for TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION,
             * with name gpd_tee_deviceID,
             * with the new buffer.

             Then verify that the syntax matches RFC 4122, i.e.
             * format similar to 6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8 and
             * allow upper and lower cases and
             * TEE_SUCCESS,
             * verify the length field
Manual Execution:
No

GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.GC002_UUID_gpd_tee_deviceID
TestCase_BC003_nameNull ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that attempted retrieval of NULL name properties as a string fails.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get name=NULL should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.BC003_nameNull
TestCase_BC004_nameUnknown ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that attempted retrieval of unknown properties as a string fails.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get gpd_ta.appID should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND_.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:

GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.BC004_nameUnknown
TestCase_BC005_UUID_bufferNull ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify the behavior of TEE_GetPropertyAsString on a UUID with buffer pointer NULL.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_appID" with buffer pointer = NULL and length of 0 Should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and also update to the necessary length Allocate a buffer of exactly one less than the length returned in the previous step Call the api again with the newly allocated buffer, then verify that buffer was not modified at all, Verify the result is TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER, verify the length field is the required length For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_ta_appID" with buffer pointer = NULL and length of 4 should cause a TA panic
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.BC005_UUID_bufferNull
TestCase_BC006_UUID_bufferPartiallyUnwritable ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that a request to retrieve the UUID property fails if part of the output area is not writeable.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get gpd_ta_appID as a string, but with buffer partially in an unwriteable area should cause a TA panic
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:

TestCase_GC007_lengthRetrieval_UUID_gpd_ta_appID ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that the length of gpd_ta_appID property can be correctly retrieved.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get gpd_ta_appID with buffer pointer = NULL and length of 0. Should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and also update to the necessary length.

TestCase_GC006_Bool_gpd_ta_singleInstance ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that a boolean property can be correctly retrieved as a string.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get gpd_ta_singleInstance as a string with buffer pointer = NULL and length = 0 Should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and also update to the necessary length Allocate a buffer of exactly the length returned in the previous step For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get gpd_ta_singleInstance as a string and verify that it is "false" and TEE_SUCCESS

Focus:
Verify that an integer property can be correctly retrieved as a string.
Test Steps:

TestCase_GC016_BinaryBlock ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that a binary block can be correctly retrieved as a base64 string.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA (GPForwarderTA) get "smc.ta.testbinaryblock" with buffer pointer = NULL and length of 0 Should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and also update to the necessary length Allocate a buffer of exactly the length returned in the previous step Call the api again using the new buffer, then verify that it is base64 encoded string of "This is a text binary block!" as expected, and verify the return value is TEE_SUCCESS, verify the length field
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
410A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.GC016_BinaryBlock

TestCase_GC021_Identity_gpd_client_identity ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that an identity property can be correctly retrieved as a string.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA get "gpd_client_identity" with buffer pointer = NULL and length of 0 Should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and also update to the necessary length Allocate a buffer of exactly the length plus 8 returned in the previous step Call the api again using the new buffer, then that the string is "string : uuid," that the return code is TEE_SUCCESS, that the length is updated, and that the buffer was not written past the length
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.00100_TEE_GetPropertyAsString.GC021_Identity_gpd_client_identity
